name: The Jackening
description:
This game was created for Curdle Jam #4.

Backstory:

All of the cards lived in harmony on the blackjack table, until one day, one jack traded everything for a chance to use black magic to turn into a black jack. The magic was so effective, in fact, that not only did the blackjack jack become a black jack, but Jack Black himself. With your people under Jack Black's control, you must use Jack Black's own black magic against him in order to take him down and stop him from turning all of the jacks black.

Gameplay:

Take on Jack Black as a jack. Race against your best time, and try out two different difficulty levels.

Controls:

Use WASD or the ARROW KEYS to dodge and weave through Jack Black's attacks.

Run into heart cards to damage Jack Black

Theme: Jack of All Trades

Not only did the blackjack jack trade everything in order to obtain black magic he used to turn into Jack Black, the black jack, but he is also a traitor to his people. 

Credits:

Game made in Unity

Music made with Bosca Ceoil

SFX made with Audacity

Art made with Piskel

Created by:

Xychara (the rest)

Meepcat1 (Music, ideas, playtesting)

Coolbluedog1 (Ideas, playtesting)
